author: goffinet
msg: CASSANDRA-911 fixed incorrect timeout calculations. Patch by Roger Schildmeijer and Kelvin Kakugawa, reviewed by Chris Goffinet.

author: hboutemy
msg: added XML schema reference to (old) archetype descriptors

author: hboutemy
msg: fixed old archetype descriptor to match effective descriptor parsing: testResources and siteResources contain resource elements, and testSources contains source elements

author: chammers
msg: Lowered pear_installer version dependency to 1.7.0 to make the PEAR package
installable on older systems. Tested on Debian unstable with PEAR 1.9.0 and
Debian lenny with 1.7.1. The 1.8.0 was already in the auto generated
package-config.php so probably just the current release at that time.

author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled plugin from reporting section and used ordinary plugin parameters
